3: (Static)
...About time. Finally got a hold of you...
Lucia! Lucia! I've finished up here! I'm on my way back!
But... You're too late...
No problem! I've finished up my mission and have the perfect Christmas tree!
Let me guess... You got a little carried away?
...The White Kuroro are all used up, and Lee's frame is overheating.
Karenina and the commandant are waiting for the next phase.
But the main problem is... you going MIA like that... We were worried sick.
Okay! I get it! I get it!
...Sorry.
I got a little carried away...
It's okay. I know I messed up. But I'll make it up to you! I'll bring back the most perfect bestest Christmas! Full speed ahead!
What ornaments are you going to decorate the tree with?
Ornaments...!
Huh? Aren't you planning to decorate the tree? A Christmas tree without ornaments is just a naked tree! Even I know that...
We need lights, gifts, stockings, and sorts of other stuff!
You're right. We can't forget to decorate it. Thanks for reminding me, Nanami.
Well, DUH! I'm awesome like that. Hehehehe!
But where are we gonna get decorations in a place like this? My brain hurts just thinking about it.
If you can't decorate the Christmas tree and make it pretty, I'm gonna be upset... Hurry, Lucia! Think of something!
Anything around you we can use?
There's just stumps and rocks here! What else is there?!
...What about decorating it with Kuroro cogs?
No, no, no! What's special about that?!
How about we carve some animals out of wood?
Huh—? Who decorates a Christmas tree like that? No one!
You're thinking about it all wrong! You've got a lousy taste, Lucia...
...Well then, what do you suggest?
Ughhhhh... Leave it to me! I'll bring back the most bestest and prettiest Christmas tree ever!
That's what she promised... But I got a bad feeling about this...
